column5: When clocks go back 1 hr You get to sleep 1 hr more.         I have weird dreams. LOL  dsn
I'd say you have weird dreams lol,thanks for the reminder
And don't forget to change the batteries in ALL your smoke detectors too.  Changing them with your clocks twice a year is a good way to remember.   You DO have smoke detectors.......don't you ??
Yep I live in rental unit so never ending power supply unless theres a blackout!! LOL  dsn
That is exactly why you need at least one battery operated smoke detector. Get one, even a cheap one for less than 10 bucks.
A high percentage of fires happen when the power is out...candles for light etc. and what Pikehunter said..buy one. $15 or your life?
